alert.note: Alert for Barton; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 7:39PM CST until December 15 at 8:15PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CST FOR CRAWFORD...NORTHERN BARTON AND VERNON COUNTIES... At 739 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rich Hill to near Walker to near Arma, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pittsburg... Prairie State Park... Nevada... Lamar... Frontenac... Girard... Arma... Liberal... Sheldon... Mulberry... Mindenmines... Franklin... Montevallo... Arcadia... Walker... Schell City... Bronaugh... Lamar Heights... Moundville... Richards... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 66 and 102. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
